meta.title: Meta
meta.passwdDesc: (Editing password is required when editing the chart from another PC, clearing the browser cache, etc.)

meta.confirmLoad: Overwrite the chart data with this file?
meta.convertingWarning: This chart has been converted from the old format (ver.{ver}), and some notes may behave differently. Saving will overwrite the chart data with the converted data. (For details, please check the update history at the bottom of the top page.)
